Sentencas: The relatively high operating temperature of the solid oxide fuel cell allows for a highly efficient conversion to power, internal reforming, and high-quality by-product heat for cogeneration or a bottoming cycle.
Titulo: Technical analysis of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine cycle

Sentencas: Besides, high-temperature fuel cells offer a good opportunity for coupling to a gas turbine.
Titulo: Technical analysis of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine cycle

Sentencas: Fuel cell systems have demonstrated minimal air pollutant emissions and low greenhouse gas emissions.
Titulo: Technical analysis of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine cycle

Sentencas: This paper focuses on the investigation and technical analysis of a direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell (DIR-SOFC) and a gas turbine (GT) system.
Titulo: Technical analysis of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine cycle

Sentencas: The technical analysis comprises of an energy and exergy analysis of the hybrid cycle, using the Gibbs function minimization technique for the methane steam reforming process.
Titulo: Technical analysis of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine cycle

Sentencas: The assessment is performed to determine the influence of the hybrid cycle operating temperature and pressure, steam-to-carbon ratio and fuel and oxidant usage in the fuel cell.
Titulo: Technical analysis of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine cycle

Sentencas: Equilibrium calculations are made to find the ranges of inlet steam-tocarbon ratio and the operating current density of the fuel cell.
Titulo: Technical analysis of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine cycle

Sentencas: After that, a hybrid system consists of a DIR-SOFC and a GT is evaluated using computer simulation.
Titulo: Technical analysis of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine cycle

Sentencas: The results showed that the fuel cell is the main power producer system at the design point.
Titulo: Technical analysis of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine cycle

Sentencas: The high-energy efficiency (around 62%) and exergy efficiency (around 58%) are achieved by the hybrid cycle compared to fuel cell efficiency (about 40%) and the GT (around 38%).
Titulo: Technical analysis of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine cycle
Technical analysis of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine cycle

Sentencas: An analysis varying the fuel cell current density and the GT pressure ratio was performed showing that the fuel cell power production decreases about 7% with increasing current density when the GT becomes the main power-producing equipment.
Titulo: Technical analysis of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine cycle

Sentencas: However, the system energy efficiency decreases with the reduction of power produced by the fuel cell.
Titulo: Technical analysis of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine cycle
